name: Plugin messages
description: This is the messages of the plugin

packs.name: English version (Default Pack)
packs.description: Note: The first pack will be considered the default pack, others packs cannot have messages that doesn't have in the default pack.

messages.only_players: &cThis command can only be performed by players in-game
&cEsse comando só pode ser executado por jogadores dentro do jogo!
messages.change_language: &8 - &7Você pode alterar a sua linguagem usando &f/language&7.
